subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Contests and Prizes
lead_paragraph: Payout to players will nearly double by 2017, reaching $50 million, and starting in 2015, men’s players will compete in a Sunday final with a day of rest after the semifinals.
snippet: Payout to players will nearly double by 2017, reaching $50 million, and starting in 2015, men’s players will compete in a Sunday final with a day of rest after the semifinals.
